name: deep NOVA
description:
deepNOVA is an action space shooter, inspired by the "Star Fox" series.

Control your starship in third person through the atmosphere of the planet Echorapdell and dodge all obstacles in your path.
Destroy asteroids and defeat enemy ships to get points. How long can you survive? 

Share your highscore on Twitter with #deepNOVA and compete with other players to become the best.

This game was made during the "SAE DACH Online Game Jam 2020". Thanks to MoonyMary for helping me out with testing and ideas.
